channel.title: CyrenePK - Login and PK
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/3420/60vm.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[SIZE=3]I welcome everyone to this thread,
My friends and I decided that we were sick of all the spawn servers that were based on what the owners liked and not what the individual players wanted. So we decided to come out with a new server, where the players would decide what would come into game. It is a spawn server, but skilling and bossing have a big impact on the server as well. Media below will show what has been done and will give you a decent idea on what type of server this will become.
[color=purple][CENTER][SIZE=4]Lets start with In-Game Features - [/SIZE][/CENTER] - Only Combat stats can be set - Caskets ( recieve from slayer monster drops) - Duel Arena - All skills and almost flawless - Warrior's guild - Jad - Barrows - Achievement Shop - Ingame PK highscores - 2010 Look - Zoom in and out - BarrelChest - KBD - Dagganoth Kings - GWD - Corporal Beast - Chaos Elemental - Nomad - Tormented Demons - KBD - Jad
[SIZE=4]Media[/SIZE]
Welcome Home
[IMG]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/1784/yr9d.png[/img]
Donator Items turn into cash.
[IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/1090/dq7n.png[/img]
FunPK -
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pDxx1z7.png[/img]
Pk Shop (Items will be added with players advice)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7cvnuUb.png[/img]
Barrel Chest Boss
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/89rAo7b.png[/img]
Skilling Island [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5XVfScI.png[/img]
Customizable Client
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1ufmBR9.png[/img]
Achievement Journal (colors change as you get further in
achievements)
[IMG]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/4725/1kl3.png[/img]
Jad
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cyWvudN.png[/img]
[SIZE=6][url=http://Cyrenepk.com]Forums[/url]
[url=http://Cyrenepk.com/webclient]Webclient[/url]
[url=http://Cyrenepk.com/webclient/client.jar] DL client[/url] [/SIZE]

item.title: CyrenePK - Login and PK
item.dc:creator: @hugandrob hugandrob
item.description:
@hugandrob wrote:

[CENTER] [/CENTER]

[SIZE=3]I welcome everyone to this thread,

My friends and I decided that we were sick of all the spawn
servers that were based on what the owners liked and not what the individual
players wanted. So we decided to come out with a new server, where the players
would decide what would come into game. It is a spawn server, but skilling and
bossing have a big impact on the server as well. Media below will show what has
been done and will give you a decent idea on what type of server this will
become.
